name: Employment agreement
description: A employment agreement is the document by which employers and their employees can define their rights and obligations at the start of the employment relationship.

employerType.text: Is the employer an individual or an organization?

organizationEmployerName.text: What is the employer’s business name?

organizationType.text: What type of organization is the employer’s business?

employerAddress.text: What is the employer's Ethereum address?

employeeAddress.text: What is the employee's Ethereum address?

employmentType.text: What type of employment will this relationship be?

employeePosition.text: What will be the employee's position?

employeeDuties.text: Enter the employee’s duties, as they are expected to be performed under this contract.

trialPeriodExist.text: Is the employee subject to any kind of probationary period at the start of the employment relationship?

timePeriod.text: How long is the probationary time period?

currencyList.text: What is the currency or currencies that will be used to pay this salary?

annualSalary.text: How much will the annual salary be, in U.S. dollars?

detailsAnnualSalary.text: Enter the specific details of how payment is made to the employee each pay period.

hourlySalary.text: Amount of hourly compensation the employee will receive, in U.S. dollars.

detailsHourlySalary.text: Enter the specific details of how payment is made to the employee each pay period.

comissionSalary.text: Enter the details of the commission compensation structure.

wagePlusCommission.text: Enter the details of the wage plus commission compensation structure.

monetaryBonus.text: Does employee’s compensation include any kind of monetary bonus?

bonusStructure.text: Enter the details of the employee’s bonus structure.

review.text: Will the employee be subject to any kind of review of their compensation, such as a formal or informal discussion at specific time periods?

reviewFrequency.text: How often will compensation be reviewed?

kpi.text: Which are the key performance indicators?

schedule.text: What will the employee’s work schedule be (including number of hours, specific days if any, etc.)?

vacationDays.text: How many days of vacation will employee receive per year?

vacationWeeks.text: How many weeks of vacation will employee receive per year?

rollOver.text: If the employee does not use all of their vacation time, does it roll over to the next year?

vacationLimit.text: Does the employee have a limit to how much vacation time they can roll over and stockpile?

vacationStockpile.text: How much vacation time can the employee roll over and stockpile before they must use it or lose it (in days)

writtenNotice.text: How many weeks notice does the employee need to give for termination?

governingLaw.text: Which will be the arbitrator of this agreement?

disputes.text: In the event a dispute arises, how will it be resolved?

startingDate.text: What is the date of this agreement?

endDate.text: What is the date the employment relationship will end?
